item.description: This venue was suggested by someone who was at Breakheart last month. I'm sorry, I forget who it was! But when I looked up Cat Rock on Google, it looked really nice and got very good reviews. It's trails around a pond, plus some big open areas; not fenced in, but far from any traffic. There are some lovely pictures of the area you can find easily on Google. I have set the date for the Sunday of Columbus Day weekend, but if that's hard for too many people, we could change it! Just tell me.

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: Explore Cat Rock in Weston.
